attributes.action: Make a chage to the BBC charter i the 2027 charter renewal.
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC's style and content is devisive. Many people I know from varied backgrounds now no longer listen to or watch their news and comment. One symptom of this problem is the number of people who have petitioned to abolish the organisation. 

There is a half way house and that is for the organisation to mea culpa but they are incapable of doing so.

This petition draws on the concept of the court jester, where an undiscussable subject could be brought to the prince through humour.
attributes.background: In the renewal of the Charter of the BBC, change the Corporation's  name to Britain Today

rejection.details: While we can see that you'd like public perception towards the BBC to change among people you know, you've not made clear how a name change would achieve this. A petition has to ask for a clear action that the Government can take to address an issue.
